controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include requirements for customers who are incorporated or unincorporated associations?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to be reasonably satisfied that an association exists and that the names of members of its governing committee have been provided?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for verifying association existence and governing committee composition.

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect minimum KYC information for incorporated associations (full name, principal place of administration or registered office address, unique identifying number, and names of chairman, secretary, and treasurer)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting this KYC information from incorporated associations.

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect minimum KYC information for unincorporated association members (association name, principal place of administration address, governing officer names, and individual member identification information)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting this KYC information from members of unincorporated associations.

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum requirements should be collected for associations?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to determining when additional KYC information is needed for associations.

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to verify the full name and unique identifying number of incorporated associations from ASIC, relevant regulatory authorities, association documents, or reliable independent sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying incorporated association information from these sources.

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to verify the association name and member identity for unincorporated association customers from association documents or reliable independent sources and in accordance with the individual customer identification procedure?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying unincorporated association information and member identity.

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information collected for associations should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to determining which additional KYC information requires verification.

controls.label: Does your program require that verification of association information be based on constitution/rules, certified copies, meeting minutes, ASIC/regulatory authority data, reliable independent documents, or reliable independent electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Describe the specific verification sources and methods your program uses for associations.

controls.label: Does your program permit the use of disclosure certificates to verify association information where the information is not otherwise reasonably available from standard sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe the conditions and circumstances under which disclosure certificates are accepted as verification.

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies identified during verification of association information and to determine ongoing satisfaction with association existence and governing committee composition?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedures for handling discrepancies in association verification and reassessing your satisfaction.

groups.title: Customer Due Diligence — Associations
groups.description: Compliance requirements for associations as customers: collection, verification, and ongoing assessment.

groups.title: Scope and Obligation
groups.description: Determine whether your program covers associations as customers and establish baseline risk management systems.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Collect minimum required information for incorporated associations and unincorporated association members.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Verify collected information using prescribed sources and methods; determine additional verification requirements.

groups.title: Handling Discrepancies
groups.description: Respond to verification discrepancies and reassess satisfaction with association information.
